required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Three Different Laparoscopic Approaches for Ovarian Endometrioma and the Effect on Ovarian Reserve
clinical_study.official_title: Three Different Laparoscopic Approaches for Ovarian Endometrioma and the Effect on Ovarian Reserve

brief_summary.textblock: Is ovarian reserve and fecundity rate higher with laparoscopic ovarian aspiration rather than laparoscopic ovarian cystectomy and laparoscopic ovarian de-roofing in infertile woman with ovarian endometrioma or not?

detailed_description.textblock:
Primary objective:
To assess antral follicular count before and after treatment of endometriotic cyst either by aspiration, stripping, de-roofing and bed cauterization.
Secondary objectives To assess anti mullerian hormone level, follicle stimulating hormone level ,Doppler blood flow before and after treatment of endometriotic cyst either by aspiration, stripping, de-roofing and bed cauterization.

primary_outcome.measure: The antral follicular count which records the number of visible ovarian follicle (2-10 mm mean diameter) seen by transvaginal ultrasound on menstrual cycle( days 2_5)

secondary_outcome.measure: Anti mullerian hormone level in blood secreted by antral follicles 2-6 mm diameter in ovary
secondary_outcome.description: Measure in ng/ml cut point is( 0.2-0.7)

secondary_outcome.measure: Follicle stimulating hormone in blood secreted by antral follicles on day 2-4 of menstrual cycle
secondary_outcome.description: Cut point is(10-20) measured in international unit/litre

arm_group.arm_group_label: Group A; laparoscopic ovarian endometrial aspiration
arm_group.description: Laparoscopic ovarian endometrial aspiration will be done for thirty patients with ovarian endometriotic cyst. .

arm_group.arm_group_label: group B; laparoscopic ovarian endometrial stripping
arm_group.description: Laparoscopic ovarian endometrial stripping will be done for thirty patients with ovarian endometriotic cyst.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Group c laparoscopic ovarian endometrial de-roofing
arm_group.description: Laparoscopic ovarian endometrial de-roofing and bed cauterization will be done for thirty patients with ovarian endometriotic cyst.

intervention.arm_group_label: Group A; laparoscopic ovarian endometrial aspiration
group B; laparoscopic ovarian endometrial stripping
Group c laparoscopic ovarian endometrial de-roofing

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Infertile woman aged 18-35 years old.
- Endometriotic ovarian cyst with size less than or equal 5 cm.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Other than included criteria.
